description.value:
Shoulder or Sternum Mounted. +10 to Medicae and Interrogation Tests (must have skill), has six injectors that can house drugs (supplied seperately). Staunch blood loss as half action, chain scalpel can amputate with +0 Medicae test, or deal 1d5 Rending damage.

Requirements

Legally, limited to members of the Adeptus Mechanicus, requires relevent Mechadendrite Use Talent and Cyber-Mantle. May not have more Mechadendrites than Toughness Bonus

Effect: Very Rare

Notes: 500 T
